oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Portrait of Andrew Jackson, 7th President of the United States
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A portrait of Andrew Jackson as he appeared after he was elected president of the United States in 1828.

Andrew Jackson was born on March 15, 1767. During his lifetime he served as a lawyer, a judge, a congressman, a senator, a military general and as President of the United States. He was elected as the 7th President of the United States in 1828 and was reelected in 1832. He died on June 8, 1845.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Jackson, Andrew, --1767 - 1845
Photographs
